title: Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee Website - Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Create Islamic-themed design system with deep green, gold, and cream color palette, geometric patterns, and elegant typography
acceptanceCriteria: Site uses a deep green, gold, and cream color palette consistently
Islamic geometric decorative elements are present in headers, dividers, or borders
Typography is elegant and readable throughout all sections

file_operations.description: Extend the Tailwind theme with custom colors for deepGreen, gold, cream, and off-white. Add custom font families for elegant serif and Arabic-influenced typography. Define custom spacing and border utilities for geometric patterns.

Import elegant serif fonts (e.g., Playfair Display, Cormorant) via Google Fonts. Define global CSS custom properties for the Islamic-themed color palette. Add base styles for geometric border patterns and decorative elements using CSS gradients or SVG backgrounds.

requirements.summary: Build Hero/Header section with organization name, tagline, and navigation bar linking to all main sections
acceptanceCriteria: Organization name is prominently displayed in the hero section
A tagline is shown beneath the organization name
Navigation bar links scroll to all main page sections

file_operations.description: Create a Header component displaying 'Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee' as the organization name with the logo image from frontend/public/assets/generated/committee-logo.dim_256x256.png. Include a navigation bar with smooth-scroll links to sections: About Us, Services, Announcements, Donate, Contact. Style with Islamic geometric borders using the theme colors. Verify the generated image dimensions before implementing.

Create a HeroSection component with the mosque banner image from frontend/public/assets/generated/mosque-hero-banner.dim_1440x600.png as a background or featured image. Display the organization name 'Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee' and tagline 'Serving the Community with Faith and Compassion' overlaid on the image with elegant typography and gold accents. Verify the generated image dimensions before implementing.
Import and render the Header and HeroSection components at the top of the page. Structure the App component to include all main sections in sequence with proper section IDs for navigation anchors.

requirements.summary: Build About Us section describing mission, values, and community purpose with placeholder text
acceptanceCriteria: About Us section is visible on the page
Contains mission and values text
Section is clearly titled and styled consistently with the theme

file_operations.description: Create an AboutSection component with section ID 'about' for navigation. Include a title 'About Us' styled with the Islamic theme. Add placeholder content describing the Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee's mission, values, and community purpose. Use the geometric divider image from frontend/public/assets/generated/geometric-divider.dim_1200x80.png as a decorative separator. Apply consistent typography and spacing. Verify the generated image dimensions before implementing.
Import and render the AboutSection component after the HeroSection in the main page flow.

requirements.summary: Build Services & Programs section listing welfare activities with icons, titles, and descriptions in a responsive grid
acceptanceCriteria: At least 4 welfare services/programs are displayed as cards
Each card has an icon or visual element, a title, and a short description
Cards are laid out in a responsive grid

file_operations.description: Create a ServicesSection component with section ID 'services' for navigation. Display at least 4 service cards: Education Support, Food & Ration Distribution, Medical Assistance, and Community Events. Each card should have an icon (using lucide-react icons), a title, and a brief description. Layout cards in a responsive grid (1 column mobile, 2 columns tablet, 4 columns desktop). Style cards with subtle borders and geometric ornamental touches using the Islamic theme colors. Use the geometric divider image from frontend/public/assets/generated/geometric-divider.dim_1200x80.png as a decorative separator. Verify the generated image dimensions before implementing.
Import and render the ServicesSection component after the AboutSection in the main page flow.

requirements.summary: Build Announcements/News section that fetches and displays community announcements from the backend
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores announcements with title, body, and date fields
Frontend fetches and displays announcements from the backend canister
Announcements section shows the most recent items first
Empty state is handled gracefully with a placeholder message

file_operations.description: Create a custom React hook that fetches announcements from the backend using the getAnnouncements() method. Handle loading, error, and empty states. Sort announcements by date in descending order (most recent first). Return the announcements array and loading/error states.

Create an AnnouncementsSection component with section ID 'announcements' for navigation. Use the useAnnouncements hook to fetch and display announcements. Render each announcement with its title, body, and formatted date in a card layout. Show a loading spinner during fetch. Display 'No announcements at this time' message when the list is empty. Style consistently with the Islamic theme and use the geometric divider image from frontend/public/assets/generated/geometric-divider.dim_1200x80.png as a decorative separator. Verify the generated image dimensions before implementing.
Import and render the AnnouncementsSection component after the ServicesSection in the main page flow.

requirements.summary: Build Donate/Support Us section with call-to-action encouraging community support
acceptanceCriteria: Donation/support section is present on the page
Contains a clear call-to-action message
Styled prominently to draw attention

file_operations.description: Create a DonateSection component with section ID 'donate' for navigation. Include a compelling call-to-action headline encouraging support for the welfare committee. Add descriptive text about how donations help the community. Include placeholder contact/donation details. Style prominently with gold accents and Islamic geometric borders to draw attention. Use the geometric divider image from frontend/public/assets/generated/geometric-divider.dim_1200x80.png as a decorative separator. Verify the generated image dimensions before implementing.
Import and render the DonateSection component after the AnnouncementsSection in the main page flow.

requirements.summary: Build Contact Us footer with contact details and inquiry form that submits to the backend
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays address, phone, and email placeholders
A contact form is present with name, email, and message fields
Form submission stores the inquiry in the backend canister
User sees a success confirmation after submitting

file_operations.description: Create a custom React hook for handling contact form submission. Implement form state management (name, email, message), validation, and submission logic using the backend submitInquiry() method. Handle loading, success, and error states. Reset form on successful submission.

Create a ContactSection component with section ID 'contact' for navigation. Display placeholder contact information (address, phone, email) on the left side. On the right side, render a contact form with fields for name, email, and message, plus a submit button. Use the useContactForm hook for form logic. Show success message after submission and error handling. Style as a footer section with Islamic theme elements and geometric patterns.
Import and render the ContactSection component at the bottom of the page as the footer.
